intro: Gurania macrantha, commonly known as the large-flowered gurania, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its showy, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its leaves are opposite and often have a rough texture. Gurania macrantha is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and stream sides.
